# Family Tree {#family-tree .unnumbered}

The Cicconetti family spans four generations — from Victor Sr. and Eleanor in Bayonne to six grandchildren in southern New Jersey today.

## Generation 1: The Parents

```
Victor Cicconetti Sr. (1925–1980)  ─── m. ───  Eleanor Salone (d. 1997)
                                                  │
Frank Elia (d. ~1962)  ─── m. ───  Mary Chiarolanza (b. ~1920, Italy)
```
